markdownExtended.configuration.exportOut: Export files will be organized in a directory named with value specified here.
markdownExtended.configuration.puppeteer:
Customize puppeteer executable for exporting PDF and images.
Could be path of Chromium or Chrome
e.g. '/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome'
e.g. 'C:/Users/<username>/AppData/Local/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe'
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfFormat: Paper format. If set, takes priority over pdfWidth or pdfHeight options.
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfWidth: PDF paper width, accepts values labeled with units
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfHeight: PDF paper height, accepts values labeled with units
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfLandsc: PDF paper orientation. true: landscape, false: portrait.
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfMargin: PDF top margin, accepts values labeled with units.
PDF right margin, accepts values labeled with units.
PDF bottom margin, accepts values labeled with units.
PDF left margin, accepts values labeled with units.
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfPageRa: Paper ranges to print, e.g., '1-5, 8, 11-13'. Defaults to the empty string, which means print all pages.
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfHeader:
HTML template for the print header. Should be valid HTML markup with following classes used to inject printing values into them:
date: formatted print date
title: document title
url: document location
pageNumber: current page number
totalPages: total pages in the document.
markdownExtended.configuration.pdfFooter:
HTML template for the print footer. Should be valid HTML markup with following classes used to inject printing values into them:
date: formatted print date
title: document title
url: document location
pageNumber: current page number
totalPages: total pages in the document.
markdownExtended.configuration.imageQual: The quality of the image, between 0-100. Not applicable to png images.
markdownExtended.configuration.imageOmit: Hides default white background and allows capturing screenshots with transparency.
markdownExtended.configuration.tocLevels:
Headings levels to use when generating TOC (2 for h2, etc)
* Restart VSCode required to take effect.
